billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Relates to collective bargaining processes for peace officers and special officers for the city of New York
summary: Relates to collective bargaining processes for peace officers and special officers for the city of New York; requires negotiations with the certified employee organization representing such employees.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to the collective bargaining process for certain peace officers and special officers
